title: The Youthful Vendor
provenance: Robert W. Weir (Lugt 2559); Erskine Hewitt (acquired by bequest).
medium: Black chalk, white chalk on greenish-blue-gray paper
description: With his right hand, a boy supports a basket-tray resting on a boulder base; with his outstretched left hand he offers a biscuit (or bar of soap?).  On the basket-tray are biscuits (cakes of soap?) and bottles.  A tree trunk is in the right background.
name: Drawing
